# MLWritable

**Protocol**

A set of methods that saves a machine learning type to the file system.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol MLWritable : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

You use [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLWritable] to save any [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLModel] instance that adopts the protocol to the file system.

## Saving to a file

- **write(to:)**: Exports a machine learning file to the file system.

## Saving an updated model

- **model**: The underlying Core ML model stored in memory.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
